title: Crossing the Line: A Forbidden Love Military Romance (USMC Military Romance Book 1)
features: Their love is forbidden. Will they risk it all to be together?

Through the 14 years that Beau Adams dedicated to the Marine Corps, he’s never had reason to regret his decision to make the military his life until now, when loving Carrie, the only woman he can picture growing old with, could cost him his future.Carrie Armstrong joined the Air Force seeking education, experience, and travel. What she didn’t expect to find was the one thing military rules clearly state she can’t have, Staff Sergeant Beau Adams.In this modern day tale of forbidden romance, can love conquer all?
Don't miss the standalone Crossing the Line spin-off novel, Cinderella Liberty, featuring Crash!
description: From New York Times & USA Today Best Selling Author Cat Johnson
a contemporary military romance featuring a sexy alpha male Marine and a shy female Airman tempted by forbidden love.
bestselling author, Cat writes contemporary military romance and other things.
